channel.title: GitHubCopilot on Arthur's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in GitHubCopilot on Arthur's Blog

item.title: 10 Useful GitHub Copilot Tricks
item.description: Engineers often have endless tasks, so development efficiency is a major goal. GitHub Copilot, as an AI development tool, can do many things, including code generation and explanation, fixing specific errors, optimizing code, writing tests and documentation, and more.
